oml:data_set_description.oml:name: veteran
oml:data_set_description.oml:description:
**Author**: **Source**: Unknown - Date unknown **Please cite**:
Veteran's Administration Lung Cancer Trial Taken from Kalbfleisch and Prentice, pages 223-224
Variables Treatment 1=standard, 2=test Celltype 1=squamous, 2=smallcell, 3=adeno, 4=large Survival in days Status 1=dead, 0=censored Karnofsky score Months from Diagnosis Age in years Prior therapy 0=no, 10=yes
Information about the dataset CLASSTYPE: numeric CLASSINDEX: none specific
oml:data_set_description.oml:creator: Kalbfleisch and Prentice
